long_description: The REI Festival Ice Box keeps food fresh for your entire group while you're at a concert or a campout. Zip-top lid allows easy access to 2 separate compartments that help organize the interior. Also comes with a separate insulated neoprene tote for beverages and snacks; tote is accessible via a separate zip-top hatch. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof, PVC-free and easy to wipe clean. Molded-foam bottom provides structure and prevents sagging; haul handles on each end allow 2 people to carry it. The REI Festival Ice Box has a zip pocket on the end for utensils and napkins; a zip pocket on each side can hold larger items like water bottles.
short_description: The REI Festival Ice Box keeps food fresh for your entire group while you're at a concert or a campout.
